name: Beizhiyu Coal Mine

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E9%95%BF%E6%B2%BB%E7%BE%8A%E5%A4%B4%E5%B2%AD%E5%8C%97%E5%B3%99%E5%B3%AA%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Beizhiyu Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Henan Village, Yincheng Town, Shangdang District, Changzhi City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Changzhi Yangtouling Beizhiyu Coal Industry Company
owners: Shanxi Changzhi Yangtouling Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The Beizhiyu Coal Mine is operated by Shanxi Changzhi Yangtouling Beizhiyu Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Shanxi Changzhi Yangtouling Coal Industry Company and partially owned by Shanxi Rishengda New Energy Group.
